name: 18-js-ajax
description: * Use [fetch](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Fetch_API/Using_Fetch) to get data from servers (API's). * Use [json-server](https://github.com/typicode/json-server) to set up a dummy server. * Learn the difference between arrow functions and function expressions. ### Nice to knows: * What is node? * asynchronous vs synchronous JavaScript code.
